name: NextRideatUNCC
0:
”Alexa, Ask Next Ride when the next green bus comes to the student union”
”Alexa, Ask Next Ride when the next bus comes to Woodward Hall”
”Alexa, Ask Next Ride to tell me about the silver bus line”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: next ride
des: Next Ride allows Alexa to let you know when the next bus is coming around the UNCC campus.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
